Name: descending colon cancer
Definition: A parasitic helminthiasis infectious disease that involves parasitic infection of the bile ducts of the liver by Dicrocoelium dendriticum. The symptoms include cholecystitis

Name: sigmoid colon cancer
Definition: A parasitic helminthiasis infectious disease that involves parasitic infection of the bile ducts of the liver by Dicrocoelium dendriticum. The symptoms include cholecystitis

Name: colon lymphoma
Definition: A large intestine cancer that is located_in the cecum.

Name: ascending colon cancer
Definition: A sensory system cancer located_in the eye that is characterized by uncontrolled cellular proliferation in the eye.

Name: obsolete diabetic oculopathy
Definition: A sensory system cancer located_in the eye that is characterized by uncontrolled cellular proliferation in the eye.

Name: transverse colon cancer
Definition: A carcinosarcoma that has_material_basis_in gland and muscle components.

Name: colon sarcoma
Definition: A colon cancer that arises from transformed cells of mesenchymal origin and is located_in the colon.

Name: adenosquamous colon carcinoma
Definition: A colon carcinoma that derives_from squamous cells and gland-like cells.

Name: obsolete primary Fusobacteriaceae infectious disease
Definition: A colon carcinoma that derives_from squamous cells and gland-like cells.

Name: colonic L-cell glucagon-like peptide producing tumor
Definition: A disease of anatomical entity that has_material_basis_in hematopoietic cells.
